data.message: Hello! I have a problem.. Some days ago someone hacked my Facebook and they deleted my conversation with a person... Is it possible to get the conversation back? Like is there some place all the messages is saved on my phone or something?

replies.message: Hi, Lene. You can recover deleted conversation from your archived folder. http://on.fb.me/1VwSR5w -Zack
Hmm yeah. But I don't mean archived messages, but conversations that got deleted, not "hidden" like archived ones.. Is it possible to get them back? I have searched on internet too.
Like do you have the messages that got deleted? Is it saved anywhere so that I can get it back, on my phone storage or do Facebook save everything so it's possible to get it back in my messenger?? ☺️
Hello Lene, my name is Andre. I live in Eindhoven, Holland, is it possible to meet you? I like to be acquainted  with you! When was your birthday? You can contact me on number
+31402569421 or m,ail me on afmeijer55@gamail .com. I´ll be very pleased when we find each other.Many greatings from my hart, your Andre.
